name: RockPuncher
description:
Punch some rocks around to find a path to the treasure!

Best played in fullscreen mode

WASD - Move Around

Space - Interact/Select Menu Item

F - Enter/Exit Fullscreen

====================================

Adapted from Vimlark's Youtube Tutorial Content

https://vimlark.itch.io

It uses free assets created by these creators

Tiny Adventure Pack - Vryell https://vryell.itch.io/tiny-adventure-pack

Weiholmir - JustFredrik https://justfredrik.itch.io/weiholmir

Fx Pixel Art Pack 01 - Hugues Laborde https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/fx-pixel-art-pack-01

Minimalistic Loops - Goose Ninja https://gooseninja.itch.io/minimalistc-loops

8 Bit Sound Pack - Danereid1024 (Sounds by Dane) https://danereid1024.itch.io/8-bit-sound-pack
